```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

Read in Data 

```{r message=FALSE}
asthma_emergencies <- read_csv(here("data","annual_asthma_emergencies_by_county_2020_2021_2022.csv")) %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  select(-data_comment, -x8)

annual_county_aqi_2020 <- read_csv(here("data","annual_aqi_by_county_2020.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()

annual_county_aqi_2021 <- read_csv(here("data","annual_aqi_by_county_2021.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()

annual_county_aqi_2022 <- read_csv(here("data","annual_aqi_by_county_2022.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()

```

```{r}
# bind all 3 years into one df
annual_aqi <- bind_rows(
  annual_county_aqi_2020,
  annual_county_aqi_2021,
  annual_county_aqi_2022
)
```

```{r}
# join asthma with aqi df
asthma_aqi <- right_join(annual_aqi,asthma_emergencies, by = c("county","year","state"))

```
